overview: Two boys at a party. One has acquired a new chair and speaks passionately about this. Party evolves into a pure orgy, but the boys discuss chairs, undaunted by what happens at the party. Geir Grenis shorts tells intriguing stories with a hushed psychological insight into the human mind many labyrinths. A recurrent theme is often meta comments to our modern society yearning to become visible and be seen.
title: Den Nye Stolen
